description: Specification of the allowed content of work record objects shall be defined as work record specifications.
title: Work record specification
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: This parent work record specification is whole of the child work record specification(s) as the part.

informationObjectModel.title: Information object model
informationObjectModel.description: Permitted set of information objects allowed in the work record occurrence.
informationObjectModel.comment: A work record entry contains the attributes to the information object for work record.

informationObjectTypeMultiplicity.title: Information object type multiplicity
informationObjectTypeMultiplicity.description: The range of the information object(s) in work record entry allowed in the work record occurrence.
informationObjectTypeMultiplicity.comment: If no limit is explicitly specified, the unbounded keyword is specified.

action.title: Action
action.description: The permitted set of actions applied to the work record entry object in the work s record by the publisher.

actionMultiplicity.title: Action multiplicity
actionMultiplicity.description: The range of actions allowed to be represented in the work record occurrence.
actionMultiplicity.comment: If no limit is explicitly specified, the unbounded keyword is specified. If no multiplicity entry is specified, this is equivalent to no constraint.
